name: comete_moelle
author: EMPENN
description: Spinal cord lesion segmentation from T2 and STIR images.
command-line: unzip [INPUT_T2] -d T2_input; unzip [INPUT_STIR] -d STIR_input; mkdir output_folder; python3 /app_primus/inference_multimodal.py -t T2_input_input -s STIR_input -o output_folder; cp input_param_file.json output_folder/input_params.json; tar -cvzf [OUTPUT_FILE] output_folder && rm -rf output_folder && chmod -R 777 *
